item.title: BLAS Installation
item.description: BLAS(Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms) has many implementations, mainly ATLAS, GotoBLAS2, OpenBLAS, MKL, Eigen3. This note is about how I build & install & link them. ATLAS Info Page: http://math-atlas.sourceforge.net/ Version: 3.10.3 (2016-07-28) Source Code: https://sourceforge.net/projects/math-atlas/files/ Installation Doc: ./INSTALL.txt Build Before Make sure CPU THROTTLING is turned off. See INSTALL.txt The following code is how ATLAS checks whether CPU THROTTLING is turned off // ./CONFIG/src/backend/archinfo_linux.c Line 530-572 /* * If cpufreq directory doesn't exist, guess no throttling.

item.title: Report Slides Template
item.description: 仿 LaTeX beamer 的 Metropolis 主题，做了一个 Powerpoint 版本 文件在这里：https://gitee.com/zhangip/ReportTemplate 效果如下图所示：
